snippet: Research In Motion, the maker of the BlackBerry, has a quartet of masked and caped superhero characters that are supposed to help it sell more phones. Some users are not pleased.
abstract: Research In Motion, the maker of the BlackBerry, has a quartet of masked and caped superhero characters that are supposed to help it sell more phones. Some users are not pleased.
lead_paragraph: Research In Motion, the maker of the BlackBerry, gained more than a new chief executive and a new chairman over the last week. The company also has a quartet of masked and caped superhero characters that are supposed to help it sell more phones.

headline.main: BlackBerry Owners Aren't Big Fans of Cartoons
